thread.title: BRIEF-Opiant Pharmaceuticals Awarded Grant Of Approximately $7.4 Mln From The National Institutes Of Health

title: BRIEF-Opiant Pharmaceuticals Awarded Grant Of Approximately $7.4 Mln From The National Institutes Of Health

organizations.name: mln from the national institutes of health reuters

text:
April 18, 2018 / 12:10 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Opiant Pharmaceuticals Awarded Grant Of Approximately $7.4 Mln From The National Institutes Of Health Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Opiant Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* OPIANT PHARMACEUTICALS AWARDED GRANT OF APPROXIMATELY $7.4 MILLION FROM THE NATIONAL INSTITUTES OF HEALTH FOR DEVELOPMENT OF OPNT003, INTRANASAL NALMEFENE, FOR TREATMENT OF OPIOID OVERDOSE 
* OPIANT PHARMACEUTICALS-GRANT INCLUDES ABOUT $2.6 MILLION TO BE FUNDED FOR PERIOD ENDING MARCH 31, 2019, WITH BALANCE TO BE FUNDED OVER SUBSEQUENT 2 YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
